ShortDescription.Value: A WriteEverywhere-Module that replaces Vanilla Signs with German ones.

Publish.LongDescription:
# German Vanilla Theme Overrider
Hello and Hallo. This is a **EU** and **NA** Vanilla Theme Overrider that turns Vanilla Signs, Roadmarkings and Decals to German ones.
### Functions - Works **automaticly**, you don't need any knowledge whatsoever! - Variable working Street Signs - Variable working Bus/Tram Signs with max. 5 Lines displayed - Style based on Ruhrbahn Essen Signs - Bicycle Parking Spots - 3D Model Signs
---
## Requirements - [Write Everywhere](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/92908/Windows) â€“ required
---
## Check out the corrosponding Sign Pack or the other Country Packs/Overrider - [German Signs](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/120627/Windows) - [Other Countries](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/authors/UnMaestro)
---
## Credits and Special Thanks - To **Klyte45** for the WriteEverywhere mod. - **Klyte45**s [Vanilla Theme Override Mod](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/106877/Windows), without that I would have lost my mind. - ---
## Enjoy & Share Your Feedback!
Publish.ChangeLog: ## Ver 1.2 Update ### Added - 3D Models for 95% of the signs - NA Theme Support
